title: Saul
section: Associate of Science for Transfer in Mathematics
text:
Associate of Science for Transfer in Mathematics
In June 2023, I reached a major milestone by earning my Associate of Science for Transfer (AS-T) degree in Mathematics from Foothill College. My curiosity and passion for math began early and grew significantly during my time at Foothill, preparing me for advanced studies at UCLA in Statistics and Data Science. I’ve also enjoyed tutoring mathematics, which continually fuels my enthusiasm for the subject and helps me share its value with others.

title: Saul Magallon
text: Saul Magallon is a fourth-year UCLA student focused on becoming great at data analysis. When he’s not diving into complex datasets, he channels his competitive energy into video gaming.

title: Saul Magallon
text:
Education
University of California, Los Angeles | Los Angeles, CA Bachelors Degree in Statistics & Data Science | June 2025

title: Saul
text:
B.A. Statistics and Data Science
I’m finishing up my Bachelor’s in Statistics and Data Science, and I really enjoy turning complicated data into clear, useful insights—basically making sense of the numbers so they tell a meaningful story. I focus on building predictive models, uncovering useful patterns, and solving real business problems. My goal is to work closely with teams who see analytics as a way to drive real results, growth, and innovation.
